products.title: Hive Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hivesilkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb dim-out fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Made to measure hive silkweave ash grey perfect fit pleated blind, px78004.

products.title: Hive Blackout Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hive blackout silkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Blackout Silkweave Ash Duo Thermal Blind
products.description: Hive silkweave, a classic linen look adding a touch of warmth and elegance to any room in the home. Perfect fit hive blackout silkweave ash duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Matrix Blackout Silver Duo Thermal Blind
products.description: Hive blackout matrix, is a subtlety patterned fabric ideal for adding a hint of pattern where desired and with the added benefit of being blackout, it's great for bedrooms. Perfect fit hive matrix blackout silver duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Hive Lusso Steel Perfect Fit
products.description: Hivelussosteel perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The hive lusso range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive lusso steel grey perfect fit pleated blind px80205.
